page.title: 06BRACELANDS CAMPSITE
page.content:
{Bracelands campsite}is situated around grid reference{560131.}It is{12 {hectares}in size and can hold about { {650 tents and caravans}at any one time. Regulations say that each unit must be at least{6 metres}apart. The most popular time for visitors is{Spring Bank}Holiday. The charges for 1985 are. {High season Low season Adults Â£1.70 Â£1.35 Juniors Â£0.90 Â£0.70 Youth Site Â£0.70 Â£0.70
The{Youth Site}is a one hectare area within the main campsite which is specially reserved for young people. Fires and barbecues are allowed in this area. Singing and parties are allowed on both sections provided people do not complain.
